templates.name: Welcome Email
templates.subject: Welcome to {{company}}!
templates.content:
Dear {{firstName}},

Welcome to {{company}}! We're excited to have you on board.

Best regards,
{{senderName}}

templates.name: Sales Outreach
templates.subject: Improving {{company}}'s {{department}} Efficiency
templates.content:
Hi {{firstName}},

I noticed {{company}} is looking to enhance its {{department}} operations. Our solution has helped similar companies achieve {{benefit}}.

Would you be interested in a quick chat?

Best regards,
{{senderName}}

templates.name: Partnership Proposal
templates.subject: {{company}} + {{partnerCompany}} Partnership Opportunity
templates.content:
Hi {{firstName}},

I'm reaching out because I see great potential for collaboration between {{company}} and {{partnerCompany}} in the {{industry}} space.

Our {{solution}} could complement your {{offering}} by providing {{benefit}}.

Would you be interested in exploring this partnership?

Best regards,
{{senderName}}

templates.name: Customer Success Check-in
templates.subject: How's your experience with {{product}}?
templates.content:
Hi {{firstName}},

I noticed you've been using {{product}} for {{duration}} now. I wanted to check in and see how things are going.

Have you had a chance to explore our new {{feature}} that helps with {{benefit}}?

I'm here to help if you need any assistance or have questions.

Best regards,
{{senderName}}
